section.name: Description
section.p: The JavaClass CEA provider is the default provider bundled with the generic CEA server. It exports 'applications' implemented as static java methods. Only simple types (string, int, float, etc) may be used as input and output parameters.

section.name: Configuration
section.p: Set the configuration key cea.javaclass.server.class to the fully-qualified classname of the java class containing the methods to export. If this key is not set, warnings are logged and the provider falls back to using org.astrogrid.applications.javaclass.SampleJavaClassApplications. This sample class has 'helloWorld' and 'add two numbers' methods.
